3 TinyML 支援的硬體 TinyML TensorFlow 支援的硬體說明與更新 3.1 TinyML 支援的硬體-ARM-STM32 3.2 TinyML 支援的硬體-Arduino 3.3 TinyML 支援的硬體-Eespressif 3.4 TinyML 支援的硬體-其它 3.4.1 TinyML Hardware - TFLM running on Arm® Cortex™-M55 and Ethos™-U55 NPU. date: “2021/4/9” https://review.mlplatform.org/plugins/gitiles/ml/ethos-u/ml-embedded-evaluation-kit?fbclid=IwAR2giwKU9KHqmn0aKDYLTa9Fjk5xJDRpqyl2gCsp_tOfSxQ2M37WkTc21-o Arm® ML embedded evaluation kit - 為機器學習訂製的 ARM@ ETHOS(TM)-U55 NPU This repository is for building and deploying Machine Learning (ML) applications targeted for Arm® Cortex®-M and Arm® Ethos™-U NPU. To run evaluations using this software, we suggest using an MPS3 board or a fixed virtual platform (FVP) that supports Ethos-U55 software fast model. Both environments run a combination of the new Arm® Cortex™-M55 processor and the Arm® Ethos™-U55 NPU.
